title: VR-Based Social Issue Investigation and Resolution Project

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of social issues and ability to utilize digital devices
context.additional_context: A social problem-solving competency enhancement program for working professionals, simulating real cases via VR technology and conducting collaborative projects.

learning_goals: In VR environments, learners can analyze social issues (e.g., urban poverty, environmental pollution) and propose at least three solutions.
Using VR-based collaboration tools, learners can complete one team project deliverable (e.g., policy proposal, simulation results report) with teammates.
Based on VR learning experiences, learners can present concrete action plans for solving real-world social issues and receive peer evaluations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
